chart_description: This chart shows the number of active threads for each process running on a Windows server.

dimension_descriptions.Idle: The number of threads associated with processes in the idle state.
dimension_descriptions.LogonUI: The number of threads associated with the Windows LogonUI process.
dimension_descriptions.Microsoft.ActiveDirectory.WebServices: The number of threads associated with the Microsoft Active Directory Web Services process.
dimension_descriptions.MsMpEng: The number of threads associated with the Windows Defender Antivirus service.
dimension_descriptions.NisSrv: The number of threads associated with the Network Isolation service.
dimension_descriptions.Registry: The number of threads associated with the Windows Registry.
dimension_descriptions.SMSvcHost: The number of threads associated with the Microsoft SMS service host.
dimension_descriptions.SecurityHealthService: The number of threads associated with the Windows Defender Security Center service.
dimension_descriptions.System: The number of threads associated with the Windows system processes.
dimension_descriptions.WMSvc: The number of threads associated with the Windows Process Activation Service.
dimension_descriptions.WmiApSrv: The number of threads associated with the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) process.
dimension_descriptions.WmiPrvSE: The number of threads associated with the Windows Management Instrumentation Provider Service.
dimension_descriptions.amazon-ssm-agent: The number of threads associated with the AWS Systems Manager Agent.
dimension_descriptions.conhost: The number of threads associated with console host applications.
dimension_descriptions.csrss: The number of threads associated with the Windows Client/Server Runtime Subsystem.
dimension_descriptions.dfsrs: The number of threads associated with the DFS Replication service.
dimension_descriptions.dfssvc: The number of threads associated with the DFS Namespace service.
dimension_descriptions.dns: The number of threads associated with the DNS Client service.
dimension_descriptions.dwm: The number of threads associated with the Desktop Window Manager process.
dimension_descriptions.fontdrvhost: The number of threads associated with the Windows Font Driver Host process.
dimension_descriptions.ismserv: The number of threads associated with the Windows Identity Foundation STS service.
dimension_descriptions.lsass: The number of threads associated with the Local Security Authority Subsystem Service.
dimension_descriptions.mqsvc: The number of threads associated with the Windows Message Queuing service.
dimension_descriptions.msdtc: The number of threads associated with the Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator service.
dimension_descriptions.services: The number of threads associated with the Windows Service Control Manager.
dimension_descriptions.smss: The number of threads associated with the Windows Session Manager.
dimension_descriptions.spoolsv: The number of threads associated with the Windows Spooler service.
dimension_descriptions.ssm-agent-worker: The number of threads associated with the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Systems Manager Agent worker process.
dimension_descriptions.svchost: The number of threads associated with the Windows Host Process service.
dimension_descriptions.vds: The number of threads associated with the Windows Virtual Disk service.
dimension_descriptions.windows_exporter: The number of threads associated with the Netdata Windows Exporter.
dimension_descriptions.wininit: The number of threads associated with the Windows boot initialization process.
dimension_descriptions.winlogon: The number of threads associated with the Windows security login process.
